A trash can can be used as a portable storage unit for tools or equipment. Simply cover the top with a tarp or plastic sheet and secure it in place.
A trash can can be used as a makeshift birdhouse. Cut a few holes in the sides and top of the can, and paint it to attract birds.
A trash can can be used as a portable fire pit. Simply fill it with dirt and rocks, and light a fire inside.
A trash can can be used as a portable grill. Simply place a grill grate inside the can and start cooking.
A trash can can be used as a portable sink. Simply fill it with water and add a bucket or basin to use as a sink.
